Razorwing sneered arrogantly at Spire.

Razorwing: I have full confidence on my troops' capacities.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> LAdy Spire::
> 
> Lady Sipre opened her comlink "Kratos!!!"commanded at her lautenient
when his image appeared in her com link"Whe have some home troubles
here and I want to go to Atlantis and help the nice Lord Perseus with
his... trouble with minios. Use whatever metod that you want to
eradicate them but remember to respect Maximals, Predacons and related
signature"
> 
> "Yes, Mylady..."
> 
> 
> "I won't let you, boys, have all fun "said the lady "But you must to
be careful, I'm getting signature of four Maximals/autobots in the
road of your armies and at least you, Razorwing, wont like hurt them..."
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Saturday, September 03, 2005 2:32 PM
>   Subject: Re: Towards the Meeting, second invitation
> 
> 
>   Razorwing: They won't escape this time!
> 
>   He opened a comm channel to his troops.
> 
>   Razorwing: Send the Metal Wyvern to Atlantis. Prepare troops for heavy
>   combat in tight quarters, and equip each squads with disabling
>   weapons. I want them near termination, but still alive.
> 
>   Jotunn, on his side, also decided to help. He called Olympus, which
>   was nearer to Atlantis and mobilized troops.
> 
>   Jotunn: Mobilize two Governmental battalions. They have five Minions
>   as targets. Bring them down!
> 
>   He also entered a code that mobilized his nameless second into the
>   fight. Things would get very interesting.
